jobDescription: Job Title: Business/Data Analyst - Advanced  Location: Boston, MA  Duration: 5+ month contract  Description:Oversees the acquisition, analysis and dissemination of subject matter knowledge.Conducts high level business analysis involving complex business requirements and processes.Analyzes current processes and recommends process improvements.Provides technical and business knowledge to clients.Keeps abreast of technological and competitive developments.Conducts research on industry practices and standards and other benchmarking data.Develops position statements on complex subject matter questions.TCM is an EEO/Vets/Disabled Employer.Qualifications:SOX Testing ExperienceArcher ExperienceStrong BA Skills Minimum Job Specs:Bachelors Degree in technology, finance, business or equivalent8 years of related financial services experienceExtensive knowledge of business functionsExperience with project management methodologyExcellent analytical skillsVery strong relationship management skillsStrong writing and presentation skill
